Jinqiang Cui

I am a research scientist at Temask Laboratories, in National University of Singapore. My research focuses on simultaneous locaolization and mapping (SLAM), design and modeling of unamnned aerial vehicles (UAV).

Education

  • Ph.D.
  • Master
  • Bachelor

Publications

  • Zhiqiang Sui, Lingzhu Xiang, Odest Chadwicke Jenkins, Karthik Desingh. "The Parallel Axiomatic Particle Filter for Goal-directed Sequential Manipulation in Cluttered Scenes." Submitted to the 2016 IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA), 2016. [pdf]

Projects

libfreenect2

I am a main contributor to libfreenect2, the open source drivers for the Kinect for Windows v2 device. I reverse engineered the calibrated depth decoding, and created various hardware acceleration (CUDA, hardware codecs) drivers for Intel, NVIDIA, and Tegra platforms. I also fix bugs and improve code quality. Find my upstream contributions, also check out my personal repo.
